definition: to lock (a door)/to close with a latch/to lock into place/a lock/a latch/to lock a computer file (to prevent it being overwritten)/to lock (denying access to a computer system or device or files, e.g. by password-protection)/to focus attention on/to target
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The toner cartridge engages when the door is closed.
sentences.chinese: 盖门关闭后，硒鼓将锁定就位。

sentences.english: Seasoning the raw poultry for bourbon mustard chicken will lock in flavor within the meat.
sentences.chinese: 波旁芥末调味的鸡生禽将锁定在肉的味道。

sentences.english: Interface of a screw lock assembly areas.
sentences.chinese: 接口处一颗螺丝锁定，组装方面。

sentences.english: Optimistic locking, where a record is locked only when changes are committed to the database.
sentences.chinese: 乐观的锁定，只当数据库发生更改时锁定记录。

sentences.english: Optimistic locking, where a record is locked only when changes are committed to the database.
sentences.chinese: 乐观的锁定，只当数据库发生更改时锁定记录。

sentences.english: Imagine, for the sake of argument, that it is necessary to lock individual dice.
sentences.chinese: 为了讨论的方便，假设有必要锁定单个的骰子。

sentences.english: In this suggestion, I target two kinds of potential stakeholders. One is sponsor;
sentences.chinese: 本建议案中，我将目标锁定为两群潜在的利害关系者。

sentences.english: You will be able to edit and save perspectives into any unlocked content package.
sentences.chinese: 您能够编辑并将透视图保存到任何未锁定的程序包中。

sentences.english: Some-times he'd go wild and get locked up for a few hours .
sentences.chinese: 有时他会去野生并锁定了几个小时。

sentences.english: You are unable to lock-on to smaller helicopters, such as Little Birds.
sentences.chinese: 你不能锁定小型直升机，比如小鸟。

sentences.english: Is your code re-entrant or do you have critical section that must be locked?
sentences.chinese: 您的代码是可重入的，还是设置必须锁定的临界区呢？

sentences.english: I've locked in on his curve.
sentences.chinese: 我已经锁定他的曲球了。

sentences.english: IAB investigators target those offenses that have been traditionally corruption-prone.
sentences.chinese: 内勤局调查员会锁定历来容易导致腐败的违法行为。

sentences.english: Coordinates lockout tagout program for all authorized personnel.
sentences.chinese: 协调所有授权人员的锁定与标识项目。

sentences.english: In general use order to lock in the current lock loss or profit.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言使用锁单来锁定目前的损失或利润。

sentences.english: Notice that locked properties do not appear in the deployment time dialog.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，锁定的属性不会在部署时对话框中出现。

definition: to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to study and come to a conclusion/to judge/to determine
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to recover (sth lost or stolen)/to get back
to follow up a victory and press home the attack/to pursue retreating enemy
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on
to fight over/to contest/to vie over
